channel.title: Pirates Treasure quest
channel.description:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ----------------------Quest ID:(9) Pirates treasure------------------------ -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Npc IDs ID: 128 Redbeard Frank - coords: 250, 630 ID: 164 Luthas - coords: 339, 705 ID: 129 Wydin - coords: 274, 657 ID: 116 Wyson the gardener - coords: 295, 544
Item IDS: ID: 318 Karamja Rum ID: 182 Apron ID: 382 chest key ID: 283 gold ring ID: 163 emerald
Object ids: ID: 182 crate - coords: 337, 711 ID: 185 crate - coords: 279, 658 ID: 47 door coords: 277, 658 ID: 187 chest - coords: 126, 1467 ID: 188 flower - coords: 290, 548 ID: 188 flower - coords: 289, 548
NPC Quest Stages:
Redbeard Frank: 1)Talk to Redbeard Frank(Stage 0)------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/jd10v2e4 2) Retalk to RedBeard Frank(Stage 1)--------------------------- http://pastebin.com/gEumNkuY 3)Giving RedBeard Frank his karamja rum(Stage 2)------------- http://pastebin.com/sa9N40Tk 4)Retalking to RedBeard Frank(Stage 3)------------------------- http://pastebin.com/R5DvJJVA
Luthas: 1) Talk to Luthas(Stage 0)--------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/4gAFz49m 2) Retalk to Luthas(Stage 1)------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/taeTrshD 3) Talking to Luthas after u fill crate with bananas (Stage2)--- http://pastebin.com/2eWrDSEx
using banana on crate--------- SendMessage("you put a banana in the crate");
***note: it takes 10 bananas to fill crate***
Karamja banana crate: 1)empty crate Stage(0)---- SendMessage("The crate is completely empty."); 2)partially full crate Stage(1)--- SendMessage("The crate is partially full of bananas"); 3)full crate Stage(2)-------- SendMessage("The crate is full of bananas");
stashing rum in crate:------- SendMessage("You stash the rum in the crate");
Wydin: 1) Talk to Wydin(Stage 0)----------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/EZPZPEEf 2) Talking to Wydin after accepting the job (Stage 1)----- http://pastebin.com/2VdSsUxp
Attempting to open door in back of Wydins shop door id(47) without apron and accepting job----------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/hAR6PGVn
Attempting to open door in back of Wydins shop door id(47) with apron and accepting his job---- http://pastebin.com/bukNbe1T
Search crate with rum (Wydins shop):----------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/j8apCZ8K Search crate no rum (Wydins shop):-------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/4VtXHVLM
Wyson the gardener: 1) Talk to Wyson(stage 0)-------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/bFix3YBS 2) Talk to Wyson(stage 1) ------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/8s7VA9tB
use chest key on chest:---------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/SqXN3wRq
If you try and dig on flowers ids: (188) at coords: 290, 548 And 289, 548 then: 1) Wyson attacks you(stage 0)----------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/ZdNBEMSB
Rewards: 2 quest points
----------------- Quest notes: Wyson the gardener attacks you if you try and dig at coords: 290, 548 OR 289, 548

item.title: Pirates Treasure quest
item.dc:creator: @xrune xrune
item.description:
@xrune wrote:

----------------------Quest ID:(9) Pirates treasure------------------------

Npc IDs
ID: 128 Redbeard Frank - coords: 250, 630
ID: 164 Luthas - coords: 339, 705
ID: 129 Wydin - coords: 274, 657
ID: 116 Wyson the gardener - coords: 295, 544

Item IDS:
ID: 318 Karamja Rum
ID: 182 Apron
ID: 382 chest key
ID: 283 gold ring
ID: 163 emerald

Object ids:
ID: 182 crate - coords: 337, 711
ID: 185 crate - coords: 279, 658
ID: 47 door coords: 277, 658
ID: 187 chest - coords: 126, 1467
ID: 188 flower - coords: 290, 548
ID: 188 flower - coords: 289, 548

NPC Quest Stages:

Redbeard Frank:
1)Talk to Redbeard Frank(Stage 0)------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/jd10v2e4
2) Retalk to RedBeard Frank(Stage 1)--------------------------- http://pastebin.com/gEumNkuY
3)Giving RedBeard Frank his karamja rum(Stage 2)------------- http://pastebin.com/sa9N40Tk
4)Retalking to RedBeard Frank(Stage 3)------------------------- http://pastebin.com/R5DvJJVA

Luthas:

  1. Talk to Luthas(Stage 0)--------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/4gAFz49m
  2. Retalk to Luthas(Stage 1)------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/taeTrshD
  3. Talking to Luthas after u fill crate with bananas (Stage2)— http://pastebin.com/2eWrDSEx

using banana on crate--------- SendMessage(“you put a banana in the crate”);

note: it takes 10 bananas to fill crate

Karamja banana crate:
1)empty crate Stage(0)---- SendMessage(“The crate is completely empty.”);
2)partially full crate Stage(1)— SendMessage(“The crate is partially full of bananas”);
3)full crate Stage(2)-------- SendMessage(“The crate is full of bananas”);

stashing rum in crate:------- SendMessage(“You stash the rum in the crate”);

Wydin:

  1. Talk to Wydin(Stage 0)----------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/EZPZPEEf
  2. Talking to Wydin after accepting the job (Stage 1)----- http://pastebin.com/2VdSsUxp

Attempting to open door in back of Wydins shop door id(47) without apron and accepting job----------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/hAR6PGVn

Attempting to open door in back of Wydins shop door id(47) with apron and accepting his job---- http://pastebin.com/bukNbe1T

Search crate with rum (Wydins shop):----------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/j8apCZ8K
Search crate no rum (Wydins shop):-------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/4VtXHVLM

Wyson the gardener:

  1. Talk to Wyson(stage 0)-------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/bFix3YBS
  2. Talk to Wyson(stage 1) ------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/8s7VA9tB

use chest key on chest:---------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/SqXN3wRq

If you try and dig on flowers ids: (188) at coords: 290, 548 And 289, 548 then:

  1. Wyson attacks you(stage 0)----------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/ZdNBEMSB

Rewards: 2 quest points

Quest notes: Wyson the gardener attacks you if you try and dig at coords: 290, 548 OR 289, 548
